question: Recently, This bank has changed the methodology used by debt market players for their valuation.
explanation: To prevent the possibility of manipulation in the prices of securities, especially government securities, the RBI has changed the methodology used by debt market players for their valuation. Security/bond valuation will be based on the weighted average price of the last half-an-hour of trading. The methodology as to how the bonds are valued is crucial for mark-to-market purposes.
